title: Locate a Missing Person with a Smart Watch
description: A family reports an elderly person with dementia as missing. The person is wearing a city-registered GPS smart watch.

tasks.description: Receive a missing person report and the ID of their registered smart watch.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the critical device ID.

tasks.description: Query the real-time location of the smart watch.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system returns the current GPS coordinates of the watch.

tasks.description: Dispatch a police unit to the reported coordinates to find the missing person.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends police to the exact location.
